name: DOGA - Yoga With Your Furry Friends (Women Only)
description:
DOG +YOGA = DOGA!
Whether you're a paw-rent or just a dog lover, this one's for you!
Join us for a paws-itively calming yoga session where you can flow with your furry friend — or simply soak in the good vibes solo.
10th August
11:30 AM – 12:30 PM
DizzyDuck Studio, Koramangala
Refreshments included post-session!
No dog? No problem. Just come and unwind with like-minded humans and happy tails!

name: Run+Brekkie (Women Only)
description:
RUN + BREKKIE 
Date: Sunday, 10th August
Time: Meetup at 6:30 AM followed by breakfast after
Location: 1105, Shreyas, 13th cross. Indiranagar, 560038

Lace up and kickstart your Sunday morning the best way — with a refreshing community run followed by a delicious breakfast spread!

Run Wild, Fuel Wise 
Whether you're a seasoned runner or just looking for a fun way to stay active, this is your sign to get moving, meet like-minded folks, and treat yourself to some brekkie goodness after from ANOMALY

What’s included in your breakfast:
Croissant Sandwich (Veg/Non-Veg)
Blueberry Custard Tart
Hot Coffee

Bring your energy, your friends (or come solo!), and let’s start the day strong — together.
No better way to fuel your weekend. See you at the start line!

Contact Information
Vaishnavi-6380349608

name: Silent Reading
description: Haven’t found time to read lately? Here’s your chance to slow down. Spend two quiet hours with just you, your book, and a warm cup of coffee. No rush, no noise, just the joy of turning pages and getting lost in a story. Bring your own read or pick one from our shelves and give yourself the time you’ve been craving.

location.name: Shop No. 9, Dragonfly Reads, Jinvara
location.address: Shop No. 9, Dragonfly Reads, Jinvara, Bangalore

name: Live Like Local
description:
Step away from the city and into the heart of village life at Thagatti Village, nestled in the serene Melagiri Hills. This 2-day, 1-night retreat offers a deeply immersive experience rooted in local stories, traditions, and community living.
Reconnect with the land and embrace the pace of rural life with:
-bamboo basket making workshop
-foraging and cooking session
- permaculture farming walk
- a sunset hike and peaceful stream dips
- a slow-paced village walk guided by Madhan, your local host and naturalist, who brings the culture to life in Hindi, English, Tamil, and Kannada.
Stay in a cozy bamboo hut, savor home-cooked farm meals, and soak in bonus seasonal experiences like a local Kannada play or village festivals, depending on the time of year.
Perfect for those seeking meaningful travel, this retreat prioritizes people over places and stories over itineraries. Limited spots. Fixed menu. Deep connection.
Contact: Vaishnavi- 8796233031

name: Isopure Fitclub
description:
After an energetic debut in Hyderabad, the SOCIAL x ISOPURE Fit Club is making its way to Koramangala SOCIAL for another high-energy morning of movement, music, and mindful recovery.
Start your day with a 3K community run weaving through the heart of Koramangala, followed by a Zumba session to keep the momentum going. Refuel and recharge with a curated Isopure-powered menu designed to help you recover right, then take on fun fitness challenges for a chance to win exclusive giveaways.
Whether you’re a seasoned athlete, a casual runner, or just someone who loves a good vibe, gather your crew and be part of this fitness-meets-fun morning.

🗓 Date: Sunday, 10th August
🕖 Time: 7:00 AM onwards
📍 Venue: Koramangala SOCIAL

name: A Gnocchi Making Experience
description: Master the art of making authentic Italian gnocchi with The Italian Dumpling. This hands-on experience guides you through the process, from preparing the dough to shaping and cooking these delightful dumplings.

location.name: Italia, The Park Bangalore, MG Road
location.address: Italia, The Park Bangalore, MG Road, Bangalore

name: Basavanagudi Darshan Heritage Walk
description: Embark on a heritage walk through Basavanagudi, exploring its rich history and cultural significance.

name: The BSM Chamber Orchestra
description: The Bangalore School of Music & Fine Arts invites music enthusiasts to 'Vignettes,' an enchanting concert featuring The BSM Chamber Orchestra. This performance promises an immersive evening filled with captivating melodies and exceptional artistry, against the backdrop of the Aruna Sunderlal Auditorium. Attendees are set to enjoy a celebration of chamber music in an acoustically rich environment.

name: Open House at Koota
description: Open House at Koota is a Kaleidoscope event.

name: Afro House Workshop
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant rhythms and grooves of Afro House with Amit & Karan. This workshop is designed for all levels, blending energy, flow, and cultural roots to help you move with freedom and style. Learn, level up, and live the culture.

name: The House Quiz Off
description: The House Quiz Off, presented by 4Edge Quizzing, brings an engaging quiz experience to Smoke House Deli on Lavelle Road, Bangalore. Participants can expect a lively atmosphere with challenging questions designed for all skill levels, making it perfect for beginners as well. Teams of up to six can compete for enticing prizes awarded to the top two teams. Entry is free, with walk-ins welcome, ensuring that everyone can join in on the fun without any prior planning. A fantastic way to test knowledge while enjoying delicious food!

location.name: Smoke House Deli, Lavelle Road
location.address: Smoke House Deli, Lavelle Road, Bangalore

name: Music of the Kirana Gharana
description: Experience the captivating sounds of the Kirana Gharana, a prominent school of Hindustani classical music. This performance features Milind Chittal on vocals, Udayraj Karpur on tabla, and Ashwin Walawalkar on harmonium.

name: Reservoir Dogs
description: The Reservoir Dogs cycling event takes participants on a captivating morning ride through two of Bangalore's popular reservoirs, offering a perfect blend of nature and exercise. With scenic vistas and local avifauna, this ride promises a refreshing escape from the urban bustle while exploring the beautifully forested hills that surround these tranquil water bodies.

name: Bhuwin Experience: Noor-e-Dastaan
description: Bhuwin’s Noor-e-Daastan is an evocative musical journey that blends soulful storytelling with immersive melodies, creating an intimate space where emotions take center stage. Known for his heartfelt performances and rich lyrical depth, Bhuwin weaves narratives that resonate deeply with listeners, drawing from themes of love, longing, and human connection. This concert at Prabhath Kala Sambrama on August 10, 2025, promises an evening of poetic expression and stirring music, inviting audiences to experience the warmth, nuance, and artistry that define the Bhuwin Experience.
